title: Loud 3D: Hardcore rock'n'roll
description: Contains over 100 photos in 3-D: from famous acts such as Black Flag, Dead Kennedys, DOA, Minor Threat; to the more recherché: The Fuck Ups (& female fans the Fuckettes), Sado-Nation, Cause For Alarm, The Lewd, FU's, Crucifix, and many more. §One of the only early books on hardcore, and published in the heyday of the movement. 3-D glasses included.
author: Gary Robert
